basics.name: Ayush Sharma Kaundinya
basics.summary: Computer Science student at Gandaki College of Engineering and Science with practical experience in Artificial Intelligence, specializing in natural language processing, computer vision, and multimodal learning, with a focus on developing scalable and interpretable AI systems.

work.summary: Full‑stack engineer on a small team building web applications with Django and React, taking features from idea to deployment and focusing on clean, reliable, and efficient code.
highlights: Delivered end‑to‑end features in Django and React, from database models and APIs to responsive, user‑friendly interfaces
Optimized and profiled REST APIs to reduce response times and improve data flow between services
Collaborated closely across front‑end and back‑end to design scalable architectures and smooth user experiences

work.summary: Designed and built AI‑driven web applications, ranging from personal and portfolio projects to production‑ready tools used in real scenarios.
highlights: Built NLP‑based text summarization tools that turned long documents into concise, readable summaries
Created online proctoring systems for remote exams, including face detection and activity monitoring features
Implemented AI models for emotion detection using text and images and integrated them into web applications
Developed prediction engines and recommender systems using machine learning algorithms to provide personalized user experiences
Automated data cleaning, feature extraction, and other preprocessing steps in Python to support AI workflows

education.institution: Gandaki College of Engineering and Science
